title: 18. When Is a Natural Disaster Good for Your Health?
description: A clever study tracking the survivors of Hurricane Katrina came to a bold conclusion: when it comes to your health, place is destiny. So how can the benefits of healthier places be spread to everyone?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: A clever study tracking the survivors of Hurricane Katrina came to a bold conclusion: when it comes to your health, place is destiny. So how can the benefits of healthier places be spread to everyone?
